BusinessProfile.name: BusinessProfile
BusinessProfile.description: Represents details about the business on the license or permit application.

AccountId.description: ID of the account associated with this business profile.

BusinessOperatingName.description: Name that the business operates with.

BusinessStructure.description: Business structure as mentioned in the business license application.

BusinessTaxIdentifier.description: ID issued to the business by the taxation authority.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.
